about.heading: About Me
about.text_3: From design to creation, I love to take care of every single detail with precision and attention.
about.text_4: 'Elegance is not about being noticed, it's about being remembered.'

footer.heading: Contact Me
footer.text_1: Write me for a quote or a consultation. I'm here for your next project!
